DOC.brief_summary: In our study, the investigators want to find correlation between circulating miRNAs associated with prostate cancer metastases to bones and to lymph nodes separately with results of 68Ga-PSMA ligand PET (positron emission computed) imaging.
DOC.brief_title: microRNA Profiles Identification in Adeno Carcinoma Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Proven Adenocarcinoma Underwent prostatectomy and still present high PSA levels Refered to PSMA exam. Below 18 years old HIV/HBV (hepatitis B virus)/HCV (hepatitis C virus) positive Additional malignancy during the past five years.
